speaker: THALIARD
text: So this is Tyre, and this the court. Here

speaker: THALIARD
text: must I kill King Pericles; and if I do it not, I am

speaker: THALIARD
text: sure to be hanged at home. ’Tis dangerous. Well, I

speaker: THALIARD
text: perceive he was a wise fellow and had good discretion

speaker: THALIARD
text: that, being bid to ask what he would of the

speaker: THALIARD
text: king, desired he might know none of his secrets.

speaker: THALIARD
text: Now do I see he had some reason for ’t, for if a

speaker: THALIARD
text: king bid a man be a villain, he’s bound by the

speaker: THALIARD
text: indenture of his oath to be one. Husht! Here

speaker: THALIARD
text: comes the lords of Tyre.

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
You
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              need
              ,
               
              my
               
              fellow
               
              peers
               
              of
               
              Tyre
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Further
               
              to
               
              question
               
              me
               
              of
               
              your
               
              king’s
               
              departure
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
His
               
              sealed
               
              commission
               
              left
               
              in
               
              trust
               
              with
               
              me

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Does
               
              speak
               
              sufficiently
               
              he’s
               
              gone
               
              to
               
              travel
              .

speaker: THALIARD
text: How? The King gone?

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
If
               
              further
               
              yet
               
              you
               
              will
               
              be
               
              satisfied

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Why
              ,
               
              as
               
              it
               
              were
              ,
               
              unlicensed
               
              of
               
              your
               
              loves

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
He
               
              would
               
              depart
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              give
               
              some
               
              light
               
              unto
               
              you
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Being
               
              at
               
              Antioch
              —

speaker: THALIARD
text: What from Antioch?

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Royal
               
              Antiochus
              ,
               
              on
               
              what
               
              cause
               
              I
               
              know
               
              not
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Took
               
              some
               
              displeasure
               
              at
               
              him
              —
              at
               
              least
               
              he
               
              judged
               
              so
              ;

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
And
               
              doubting
               
              lest
               
              he
               
              had
               
              erred
               
              or
               
              sinned
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
To
               
              show
               
              his
               
              sorrow
              ,
               
              he’d
               
              correct
               
              himself
              ;

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
So
               
              puts
               
              himself
               
              unto
               
              the
               
              shipman’s
               
              toil
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
With
               
              whom
               
              each
               
              minute
               
              threatens
               
              life
               
              or
               
              death
              .

speaker: THALIARD
text: Well, I perceive I shall not be hanged

speaker: THALIARD
text: now, although I would; but since he’s gone, the

speaker: THALIARD
text: King’s ears it must please. He ’scaped the land to

speaker: THALIARD
text: perish at the sea. I’ll present myself.—Peace to the

speaker: THALIARD
text: lords of Tyre!

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Lord
               
              Thaliard
               
              from
               
              Antiochus
               
              is
               
              welcome
              .

speaker: THALIARD
text: From him I come with message unto princely

speaker: THALIARD
text: Pericles, but since my landing I have understood

speaker: THALIARD
text: your lord has betook himself to unknown travels.

speaker: THALIARD
text: Now message must return from whence it came.

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
We
               
              have
               
              no
               
              reason
               
              to
               
              desire
               
              it
              ,

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Commended
               
              to
               
              our
               
              master
              ,
               
              not
               
              to
               
              us
              .

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
Yet
               
              ere
               
              you
               
              shall
               
              depart
              ,
               
              this
               
              we
               
              desire
              :

speaker: HELICANUS
text:
As
               
              friends
               
              to
               
              Antioch
              ,
               
              we
               
              may
               
              feast
               
              in
               
              Tyre
              .
